Example.Title: Titles on Scenes Example
Example.Description:
Titles display text in a bordered box on top of regular objects in the sceme. This example creates several titles on top of a simple scene. One title is created for each predefined positioning value. Custom configuration of titles is demonstrated by creating a title with a larger font and configuring larger padding values for it. The additional area is used to place several shapes on the title.

The titles can be moved with the mouse - functionality derived from ScreenObject. As common for all scene objects in ILNumerics Visualization Engine the objects contained are freely configurable: Border, Background, Label and all custom content.
